lead_paragraph: BOTTNER--Harold, 88, of Tampa, FL formerly of Mamaroneck NY, died peacefully on January 15, 2016 after a long illness. He will be dearly missed by his beloved wife of 64 years, Dorothy, and their children, Jane, Andy, and Karen (Noel). He also leaves behind grandchildren Ben, Carolyn, Rosie and Emma. Harold will be remembered for his entrepreneurial spirit, having started HMB, Inc., a successful commercial sweater manufacturing business. His easy manner, dry wit and huge sense of humor, always accompanied by a big smile and a catchy tune, endeared him to all who knew him. Above all, Harold's honesty, kindness and generosity to others were perhaps his most lasting and loving legacy. A memorial service will be held in New York in the spring. Memorial donations can be made to Myasthenia Gravis Foundation of America, myasthenia.org or the charity of your choice. 1/3
